description: Hold onto you brain as the ride gets even stranger-Artist and writer team Dayglo & Martin land us somewhere between The Trip and Ray Harryhausen as TANK GIRL and her team struggle to find way out of the certain death that waits them. Not recommended for children, the elderly, or wussies.
name: The Bulldog Breed

description:
Zach Feld is hot on the heels of the people who have robbed him of his future. He wants his ideas back and the only thing that stands in his way is that those he's hunting know what heâ€™ll do before he does!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 7 - Highlights and Lowlifes (mislabeled as chapter 8 in the comic)
  • Chapter 8 - Just Who Is the 5 O'Clock Hero?
  • Chapter 9 - Let X Equal X
name: Highlights and Lowlifes; Just Who Is the 5 O'Clock Hero?; Let X Equal X
OÃ¹ est passÃ©e la Belle Amoureuse ?
Devinez qui a rÃ©ussi Ã  avoir son numÃ©ro spÃ©cial ?

description:
In early 1942 Lieutenant Rory Granger and his Commando squad were chosen for a daring mission to destroy a vital German radar station in the far north of Norway.
However, the plan went awry. Rory and his men found themselves up against a ruthless enemy in the bitterly cold wastes of Russia, fighting just to stay alive!
name: Operation: Red Commando

description:
Reeling back from the German onslaught in May 1940, Private Tom Dawson and his mate, Harry Greene, saw their company decimated in a terrifying Stuka attack. They teamed up with other stragglers â€” including a very unconventional Signals officer â€” determined to join the mass evacuation at Dunkirk. But to get to those beaches theyâ€™d have to make a perilous journey through occupied Belgium.
Would they all survive the RACE TO FREEDOM?
name: Race To Freedom

description:
Thirsting for excitement and adventure, paratrooper Jack Nash had seized the chance to become a mercenary â€” a hired soldier in someone elseâ€™s war â€” with the promise of action and a hefty pay-packet.
Well, Jack got plenty of action â€” more than most men could handle. As for the money, that might just be a different storyâ€¦
name: Mercenaries!

description:
They kept telling Andy Webster that he was doing a great job, beavering away behind the scenes as the war raged all over Europe. But that wasnâ€™t good enough for Andy. He wanted to be in the front line, right in the thickest of the action.
Well, his dearest wish would come true far sooner then he thought, but there was one big snag. It didnâ€™t look as if he would survive to enjoy the glory!
name: Welcome To The War!

description:
For years, comic books have given the world a chance to see brightly clad super heroes in action - saving the innocent, preventing disasters and making the world a better, safer place. Mythical heroes with one mandate - to honor the heroic ideal.

On September 11th the world changed. We found that the real-world heroes went beyond the ideals of our imagination. Heroes - men and women who saved lives with no thought of their own personal safety, and without benefit of super powers, armed only with their solitary courage.

And now looking back, we take a moment to appreciate those who are gone, and those who are still with us. A moment to reflect on those things we may have taken for granted before September 11th. We take this moment of silence to honor their memory and the heroic acts that will define this generation as well as the heroic ideal for the new millennium.

Moment of Truth

Bill Jemas and Mark Bagely bring to us the story of Tony Savas building inspector for the Port Authority and the sacrifice he made on September 11th.

Moment of Silence: A True Story

Brian Michael Bendis and Scott Morse illustrate a story told to them by a firefight with the Cleveland Fire Department. Instead of sitting and watching he and two of his fellow firefighters went to New York City and offered their help.

Sick Day

Joe Quesada and Igor Kordey bring to life a very emotional tale about a New York firefighter that gets called on September 10th to work the next day. His family anxiously awaits his return home while watching news coverage of the World Trade Center.

Periphery

Kevin Smith and John Romita Jr. show us the morning routine of a family bickering and squabbling that is shattered after the WTC gets hit by an airplane, where their dad works.
name: A Moment of Silence
Era Una Lotta Buia e Tempestosa

description:
Best-selling author Jodi Picoult (Nineteen Minutes, The Tenth Circle, My Sister's Keeper), takes Wonder Woman on a collision course with the Amazons in this hardcover volume collecting WONDER WOMAN #6-10!

The action begins when Wonder Woman, in her disguise as Special Agent Diana Prince of the Department of Metahuman affairs, is assigned to capture Wonder Woman. How can she accomplish this impossible job without revealing her secret identity? This is just the start of the Amazon Warrior's problems as Diana must relearn how to exist as a human being while a deadly foe begins to close a net on her, leading to a catastrophic outcome!
name: Love and Murder

description:
Official Solicitation

Keiichi's got a new house far from his meddling ex-dormmates, and he's living with a beautiful goddess who is bound to him by an order from The Almighty. But Belldandy is surely beyond the reach of a geek like Keiichi, or so he thinks... at least until Belldandy's voluptuous older sister Urd arrives. Irritated by the lack of "progress" in Keiichi and Belldandy's relationship, Urd wants to teach him a thing or two about seduction, but Belldandy is pretty ticked off by her sister's "hands-on" technique! Â
name: Sexy sister

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Everyone's got eyes for Belldandy and her sister Urd, "exchange students" who are secretly a pair of earthbound goddesses. It's membership drive time for the Nekomi School of Technology's Car and Cycle Club, and the women are drawing a crowd. Keichii isn't jealous, though, until Toshi, a suave, rich freshman, puts the moves on Belldandy. What's worse, this guy is so ingratiating that Keichii can't even be properly mad without looking like a heel! Toshi even offers Keichii a spin in his Ferrari, but while Keichii's out burning rubber, Toshi and his cronies are hatching a plan... a plan to discredit Keichii and seduce away his true love!
name: Belldandy's Narrow Escape

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Keiichi awakens from a nightmare in which a hideous demon threatens to transform him. Belldandy, however, isn't sure that it was just a dream. Sure enough, Tamiya encounters a strangely compelling compact disk, and he buys it, forgetting that he doesn't even own a CD player! Unfortunately, all it needs to summon forth the demon Mara is a spin on an old record player, and Mara's ready to wreak havoc on old enemies Belldandy and Urd -- through the hapless Keiichi!

Official Solicitation

Demons don't give up too easily. The Demon Mara discovers an ally with an "anti-goddess" agenda of her own, and it's time to whip up something nasty! Everyone's favorite goddess knows that you've got to break some eggs to make an omelet, but this time it may be a recipe for disaster! Â

Official SolicitationÂ 

Life with a gorgeous live-in goddess sounds perfect, but for Keiichi Morisato, it means a never-ending column of mischievous deities, frightful demons, and mystical bugs in the system marching through his house! As strange as it seems, his human friends are even stranger!

Official Solicitation

Keiichi Morisato has his hands full with two lovely goddesses hanging around the house. But trouble always comes in threes, and sure enough, goddesses are no exception! The goddess Skuld is having some trouble debugging the mighty astral computer that maintains reality, and in the process, Keiichi is suddenly dragged through an array of alternate universes, and his house is full of "bugs"! Only a game of cosmic Twister can save the universe, and if they fail, Keiichi may never see the goddesses again! Â
name: Part II #1

description:
Official Solicitation

The computer system that controls reality has been infested with bugs, and existence itself is in jeopardy! The only way to save the world is for the goddesses to return home! After all they have been through, is this the last Keiichi will see of his true love, Belldandy? Â
name: Part II #2

description:
Official Solicitation

Belldandy and Keiichi have made quiet plans for a date at a fancy restaurant, but suddenly it seems like everyone they know is there! Sayoko begins worming her way between the young lovers, but the food itself gets in the way! Get ready for a food fight the likes of which you've never seen! Â
name: Part II #3

description:
Official Solicitation

It's New Year's Day, and Keiichi's writing a New Year's resolution... to get closer to Belldandy. But when the goddesses show up, Keiichi's note to himself has the potential to become compromising material... and far be it from Urd to turn down a chance to bring these lovebirds together! Â
name: Part II #4

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

It's New Year's Day, and Keiichi's writing a New Year's resolution... to get closer to Belldandy. But when the goddesses show up, Keiichi's note to himself has the potential to become compromising material... and far be it from Urd to turn down a chance to bring these lovebirds together!
name: Part II #5 - Final exam

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

After an interesting episode in a love hotel, Aoshima plans to reveal the goddesses for who they are. Urd, Belldandy, and Morisato find themselves embroiled in a lighthearted look at the things we do for love.
name: Part II #6

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Morisato has endured the trials and tribulations of living with an enchanted goddess, but is even that enough to prepare him for the Japan College Endurance Series? Buckle yourself in for the fastest fun yet, as Morisato and the goddess Belldandy represent the Nekomi Motor Club in Japan's hottest motor rally event of the year! You'll have such a hard-driving good time, you won't even break for a pit stop!
name: Part II #7

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Morisato and the goddess Belldandy are through the trial heats for the Golden Hammer Rally! But have they made it through the heat only to fall into the fire? They're neck and neck with the American team, who is willing to win the race at any cost, especially if that cost comes out of Morisato's pocket!
name: Part II #8

description: Jim Mahfood and Scott Morse supply pin-ups.
Andi Watson supplies a pin-up

Official SolicitationÂ 

What should you do when a Goddess appears before you with an offer to grant your every wish? You should read the fine print! Keiichi is an ordinary college student, an everyman who has been granted a wish by the beautiful goddess Belldandy. His wish? That she stay with him forever, a boon that turns out to look a lot better on paper than in practice! Keiichi's other problem is the envious yuppie Aoshima, a man who is obsessed with claiming the goddess Belldandy as his own and will stop at nothing to claim her!

After Aoshima bulldozes Keiichi's aerial Motor Club on the eve of the college aviation competition, the goddess Belldandy helps Keiichi find the remains of an experimental plane engine, long-buried beneath the campus. Once the plane is assembled and Keiichi is aloft, he discovers that he has to face both good news and bad news: his Motor Club is the hit of the college festival, but his newly excavated plane has a mind of its own and refuses to let Keiichi land! Â
name: On A Wing & A Prayer

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

A magical love potion may be just what the Goddess Belldandy needs to win the heart of her mortal love, Keiichi. But the thing about potions is, they only work if the right person drinks them! Now, instead of one lovesick Goddess following him around, the poor, tortured Keiichi has got three Goddess thralls falling all over him! Mix "I Dream of Jeannie" with "Friends," and you've gotÂ Oh My Goddess!Â Love Potion Number Nineis a special stand-alone story, the perfect introduction to a great comic.
name: Love Potion #9

description:
Official Solicitation

When a Goddess gets in the habit of granting mortals' wishes, look out! Megumi is an ordinary teen-ager whose path crosses with the Goddess Mara, a spritely deity devoted to causing mischief. When she grants Megumi's errant wish -- to be inside a car instead of on the back of a moped -- Megumi gets more than she bargained for: She gets transformed into a sleek roadster, and gets sent on the ride of her life! Â
name: Sympathy For The Devil

description:
Official Solicitation

A first-place prize of $5,000 has got Tamiya hankering to get behind the wheel of a fire-burning, fuel-efficient racer -- too bad he hasn't got one! But with a little divine intervention from the goddess Belldandy, he may be on his way to the finish line faster than he thinks -- and likely faster than he wants! Getting your wish granted by a goddess isn't as great as it sounds, particularly when you're wishing for aÂ Mystical Engine! For fine farce and fun, you won't find better thanÂ Oh My Goddess!.
name: Mystical Engine

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

It's Valentine's Day, and the best way for a Goddess to show her affection is to say it with chocolates! But the hapless human Keiichi, the reluctant object of Belldandy's desire, has more than one smitten Goddess to contend with. The Goddess Urd plans to snare Keiichi's heart once and for all by spiking Keiichi's sweets with a love potion, while the mischievous Mara rigs the candies to turn Keiichi evil!
name: Valentine Rhapsody

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

It was an errant phone call that started Keiichi's problems and delivered him his own mystical goddess! Now it'sÂ anotherÂ call that takes his troubles up a notch -- this time a phone call from God! It seems the Supreme Being is revoking Urd's goddess license for fifty years, with no time off for good behavior! ThatÂ wouldÂ beÂ the answer to all of Keiichi's problems . . . if only there weren't evil forces afoot offering to re-power Urd in exchange for herÂ undyingÂ gratitude! Find out what all the fun's about in this six-issue mystical miniseries,Terrible Master Urd!
name: Terrible Master Urd #1

description:
Official Solicitation

The only thing worse than a power-mad goddess is a power-mad goddess with her own giant killer robot! Urd and her massive mechanical monster of mayhem are going to spread their terror across the universe, smashing planets and destroying whole species, but they've got to start somewhere -- and Keiichi's house is as good a place as any! Can Keiichi stop this new Lord of Terror? Can he save the galaxy from unending slaughter? And, more importantly, will an "Act of God" clause in your home insurance disable you from collecting on damage caused by a goddess?
name: Terrible Master Urd #2

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Mad with power and mad at the galaxy, Urd has set in motion a terrible spell that will destroy the earth! It's up to the goddess Belldandy to end Urd's reign of terror, and she's going to have to pull out all the stops to do it!
name: Terrible Master Urd #3

description:
Official Solicitation Â 

As if a power-mad goddess weren't enough, Keiichi and Belldandy have an even bigger problem -- and what a big nose that problem has! The giant wolf-spirit Fenrir has come to earth to aid Urd in her quest to destroy the universe! Something tells me when they get done, man will have to find a new best friend!
name: Terrible Master Urd #4

description:
Official Solicitation Â 

At last everything seems to be going right for the goddess Belldandy and her sisters. The Ultimate Destruction Program has been contained; Urd is back to her normal, intolerable self; and all is right with the world. Or is it . . . ? Â
name: Terrible Master Urd #5

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

When a misdialed number brought Keiichi his very own goddess, Belldandy, he knew he was in for some major headaches. But being possessed by the Lord of Terror . . . ? Who could anticipate that?! Now Belldandy must decide between saving her master and saving the universe, and the rest of us folk don't have much of a hope!
name: Terrible Master Urd #6

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Life is never dull when you've got your own goddess -- but sometimes dull wouldn't seem so bad! The Lord of Terror left Belldandy and Keiichi's happy home in a disastrous state. No problem, right? A wiggle of the nose and a flick of the ponytail and Belldandy's other-worldly powers make short order of the renovations. But no sooner does it come together than an internal squabble threatens to tear it apart! It's a giant-robot battle between Belldandy's similarly blessed goddess sister, Skuld, and Keiichi's sister, Megumi, and it looks like poor Keiichi will once again be the big loser!
name: Robot Wars

description:
Official Solicitation

In this techno-fied age of cyber-this and micro-that, it seems you can't do your job unless you're plugged in -- and being a goddess is no exception! The goddesses' computerized life-support system was meant to streamline things at God Central, but when it goes on the fritz, the result is nothing but trouble! Urd is regressing into a little girl, with diapers not far behind. And Skuld is growing old so fast, she may be needing diapers soon, too! With Belldandy trapped in a system-crash-induced sleep, can Keiichi save the trio before it's too late? Â
name: The Trials Of Morisato #1

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Keiichi Morisato and his homemade moon rock have saved Skuld from turning into a gray-haired babushka overnight. But while the rock had enough energy to stop one goddess' life-support system from going into perpetual overdrive, there's not enough lunar power left to stop Urd from regressing backwards in time into a little girl. While Keiichi and Skuld scramble to re-energize the rock, Urd learns a bittersweet lesson she'd forgotten as an adult: Sometimes love comes in the smallest packages . . .
name: The Trials Of Morisato #2

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Urd is back to normal after her retroactive days of puppy love. But now she has another problem: how to repay Keiichi for all the help he gave her in stopping her regression back to babyhood. Her solution: help Keiichi get Belldandy once and for all with a superpowered love potion. Unfortunately for Belldandy -- and Keiichi, for that matter -- the potion is a bit too superpowered!
name: The Trials Of Morisato #3

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Every stitch in Belldandy's hand-knit sweater for Keiichi is full of her daily thoughts of him. But before Belldandy's token of love can be delivered, she has to deal with her jealous rival Sayoko, and with a hungry dog who mistakes the wrapped-up sweater for an afternoon snack! Can Belldandy find the missing sweater before Keiichi comes home, or will Sayoko succeed in breaking the two young lovers apart?
name: The Queen of Vengeance

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Mara is back! She's healed from her beating at the hands of the Lord of Terror, and now her personal vendetta against Belldandy has been juiced into overdrive! When a Demon First Class and a full-fledged goddess go at it, "cat fight" can't begin to describe the fury with which the fur will fly!
name: Mara Strikes Back #1

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Mara's armed, dangerous, and on the loose, and she's targeting the goddess Belldandy and her two sisters! But for the Demon First Class to get to her target she has to go through Banpei, a special anti-Mara robot the goddesses created to protect their happy home!
name: Mara Strikes Back #2

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

The computer crash is over and Urd has her powers back . . . just in time to be recalled by the Creator! Mara may yet have the last laugh in the conclusion toÂ Oh My Goddess!: Mara Strikes Back!
name: Mara Strikes Back #3

description: Special Issue.
name: Linus Rosa

description: Special Issue.
name: Star Linus

description: Special Issue.
name: DiavoLinus

description:
Official SolicitationÂ 

Goddesses fight for him, demons desire him, and now Keiichi's got a new kind of headache: A ghost who's been waiting for him for three generations! It's a haunting love story that's chock full of laughs. It'sÂ I Dream of JeannieÂ meetsÂ Love American StyleÂ in Tokyo. It'sÂ Oh My Goddess!, and it's the most fun you'll ever have!
name: The Forgotten Promise
